Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch FEATURES 14k gold-plated brass 47mm demy hunter case with a matching curb chain Skeleton dial with roman numerals 17 jewel mechanical movement Deluxe gift box DESCRIPTION Intricate case details are given lustrous 14k gold accents with this classic pocket watch. It includes a curb chain and gift box for exceptional value. The high-performance, precise jewel mechanical movement is revealed with a white- perimeter skeleton dial. Roman numerals complete the look. Skeleton dial. Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold plated. Brass finish. 1.85 in. Dia. Artisan-made, and boasting the traditional appeal of 17-jewel winding movement and clear glass casing, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch 3527 is a heirloom- quality timepiece with a double-sided design. This mechanical pocket watch features a window for easy viewing right on the cover, eye-catching skeleton dial with black-tone Roman numerals, and 14K gold-plated brass Hunter case with matching curb chain. Built to last, this Charles Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue gift box.
